Yuelu Academy in Changsha, Hunan, famous ancient academy

sentences.english: President Carter and his wife visit Yuelu Academy.
sentences.chinese: 卡特及夫人参观湖南大学岳麓书院。

sentences.english: In this season, red Yuelu Mountain is most attractive for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 这个季节，红叶是岳麓山最吸引游人的景致。

sentences.english: Yuelu Academy is one of the four famous academies in China.
sentences.chinese: 岳麓书院是中国古代四大书院之一。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, we plan to climb Yuelu Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 下午，我们计划去爬岳麓山。

sentences.english: The cole flowers were planted by the Yuelu District Government of Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 长沙岳麓区政府在湘江边种下这片美丽的花。

sentences.english: In five area of Changsha City, modern service industry in Yuelu district is in the state falling behind.
sentences.chinese: 在长沙市五区中，岳麓区现代服务业处于落后状态。

sentences.english: The tea was planted on Yuelu Mountain locating in the suburb of Changsha city.
sentences.chinese: 产于湖南省长沙市郊的岳麓山。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, we plan to climb Yuelu Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在下午，我们打算爬岳麓山。

sentences.english: I found Yuelu to be absolutely stunning, and the view from the top of the mountain at night was breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 特别是岳麓山，站在山顶看风景，让人心旷神怡。
